title: Community Action Opioid Response Act of 2018
content: Community Action Opioid Response Act of 2018 This bill requires the Office of Community Services within the Department of Health and Human Services to establish a grant program that helps low-income individuals, families, and communities affected by the national opioid epidemic. Grants must be awarded to Community Action Agencies for specified activities relating to opioid misuse and abuse, including education, outreach, prevention, and treatment services.
